data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martins, Ubirajara R., Galileo, Maria Helena M., Santos-Silva, Antonio (2015): New taxa and new records in Cerambycidae (Coleoptera) from the state of Bahia (Brazil) and notes on Meridiotroctes (Acanthoderini). Zootaxa 3973 (2): 271-299, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3973.2.4
